name: dire-hit
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Increases the target’s critical hit chance by one stage until it leaves the field. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Increases the chance of a critical hit in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item that greatly raises the critical-hit ratio of a Pokémon during a battle. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
